pullRequest.title: Add FAT for concurrent JPA class transformation for PH26967
pullRequest.bodyText: Add FAT to check that the perf enhancement to the application classloader to allow concurrent classloader access across multiple threads does not interfere with JPA class enhancement.

commit.message:
Add FAT for concurrent JPA class transformation for PH26967

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: This source directory is missing from .classpath
nodes.diffHunk:

+bVersion=1.0
+
+

+	fat/src,\
+	test-applications/ConcurrentEnhancementVerification/src,\
+	test-applications/helpers/DatabaseManagement/src,\

nodes.bodyText: Any reason you use io.openliberty for package prefix in the other source directories, but in this one you use com.ibm.ws?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: I asked outside of the issue, but it seems weird to have to have cdi, el and beanvalidation features be enabled by the repeats when you do not have them in your server.xml file.  That seems like a test framework bug.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+#*******************************************************************************
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+#     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+#*******************************************************************************
+-include= ~../cnf/resources/bnd/bundle.props
+bVersion=1.0
+
+
+src: \
+	fat/src,\
+	test-applications/ConcurrentEnhancementVerification/src,\
+	test-applications/helpers/DatabaseManagement/src,\
+	test-framework/src
+
+fat.project: true
+tested.features: el-3.0, jpa-3.0, servlet-5.0, cdi-3.0, beanValidation-3.0, ejblite-4.0, jdbc-4.0, beanvalidation-1.1, jpa-2.0
